projectDesc.p: Edited by Frank Fischer. This corpus contains all 37 of Shakespeare's plays in their German translations published by Schlegel and Tieck, in the edition of Aufbau-Verlag Berlin/Weimar (3rd edition 1975), which is based on the last edition published during Schlegel's lifetime (3rd edition 1843/44). The digitised print edition was procured from Zeno.org (via TextGrid Repository), which also provided an additional play (»Die beiden edlen Vettern«) that Shakespeare is now considered to have co-authored. This is a first beta version of the corpus. For a full description please see the README on GitHub.
